action_title: Improve connectivity between areas of shrubland to allow species movements and habitat shifts in response to climate change
key_messages:
Key Messages:

We found no studies that evaluated the effects of improving connectivity between areas of shrubland to allow species movements in response to climate change on shrublands.

'We found no studiesâ€™ means that we have not yet found any studies that have directly evaluated this action during our systematic journal and report searches. Therefore we have been unable to assess whether or not the action is effective or has any harmful impacts. Please get in touch if you know of such a study for this action.
background_information:
Background information and definitions:
Improving connectivity between shrubland areas may allow species to move between shrubland habitats as climate changes and alters the suitability of sites for shrubland species.
